title: Mamie Taylor Recipe
full_text:

Ingredients

ounce
fresh

or

Directions
Fill an 8-ounce highball glass with ice and add scotch and lime juice. Fill with ginger ale or ginger beer and gently stir; garnish with a lime wedge.
